template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Arranges galaxies into larger, gravitationally interacting groups. Components: Galaxy groups, clusters, hot intracluster gas.

interfaces.name: Cluster Interaction
interfaces.description: Galaxy clusters and superclusters are the largest gravitationally bound structures in the universe, interacting through gravity, hot gas, and dark matter.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Galaxy_cluster, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Supercluster
